effect.scarlet_violet: Inflicts regular damage. If the target uses a move or switches out this turn before this move is used, this move has double power.
effect.the_teal_mask: Inflicts regular damage. If the target uses a move or switches out this turn before this move is used, this move has double power.
effect.the_indigo_disk: Inflicts regular damage. If the target uses a move or switches out this turn before this move is used, this move has double power.
effect.legends_za: Inflicts regular damage. If the target uses a move or switches out this turn before this move is used, this move has double power.

short_effect.scarlet_violet: Power is doubled if the target has already moved this turn.
short_effect.the_teal_mask: Power is doubled if the target has already moved this turn.
short_effect.the_indigo_disk: Power is doubled if the target has already moved this turn.
short_effect.legends_za: Power is doubled if the target has already moved this turn.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The user stores power, then attacks. This move's power is doubled if the user moves after the target.
